meanings.definition: Capable of being lifted or elevated.
meanings.sent1: The box on the table was raisable with some effort.
meanings.sent2: The balloons were easily raisable into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the raisable curtain fascinating to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits were raisable after receiving good news.
meanings.sent5: The kite soared high, a raisable object in the wind.

meanings.definition: Able to be increased in amount or level.
meanings.sent1: The raisable funds for the charity event exceeded expectations.
meanings.sent2: The temperature was raisable by adjusting the thermostat.
meanings.sent3: The excitement in the room was raisable as the concert drew near.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was raisable with each successful presentation.
meanings.sent5: The happiness in her heart was raisable with every kind gesture.
